tool_description: Analyzes demographic composition of audiences at specific venues, providing detailed breakdowns by age, gender, income, education, and cultural background.

venue_name.description: Name of the venue to analyze

location.description: City and state/country of the venue

analysis_period_months.description: Number of months of historical data to analyze (1-24)

error_messages: Venue not found: The specified venue name and location combination was not found in the database.
Insufficient data: Not enough historical audience data available for the specified analysis period.
Invalid analysis period: analysis_period_months must be between 1 and 24.
usage: Provide venue_name and location to get demographic analysis. Optionally specify analysis_period_months to control the historical data range analyzed.

gender_split.description: Percentage breakdown by gender: male, female, other
